title: What are some of the secret locations in PUBG Mobile? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are no “secret locations” per se.. But there are some places less visited which have good loot..Like between the Farm & Pochinki, there are few houses which can give you enough loot to move ahead and go get some kills.. Between Severny & Stabler there are many small houses..between Lipovka & the Mansion there are few houses.. The least visited and most underrated place is probably the Spawn island itself.You will definitely get a sniper, and an 8x scope among other things. The loot there is really great but going there & coming back in time is the key. Make sure to get a boat as soon as you land and then head towards the spawn island. Likewise, there are similar places in Sanhok as well, which are not much known and are between two highly populated places but have a decent loot which you’ll find when you explore..
